task_name: teach my parent to use video calls
task_description: Task to teach my parent to use video calls

must_have: Choose a user-friendly app with large buttons
Help them customize settings for accessibility (e.g., text size)
Explore options for group calls versus one-on-one calls
nice_to_have: Encourage them to practice with friends or family members first
Introduce them to features like chat and reactions during calls
Practice making a video call together before the actual call
Discuss privacy settings and how to manage participants
deal_breakers: They have privacy concerns about being on camera and don't want to be seen.
They refuse to use any technology and prefer face-to-face communication.

decision_factors: Availability of devices for video calls
Need for regular communication with family
Comfort level with learning new skills
